titleStmt.title: A discourse concerning prayer especially of frequenting the dayly publick prayers. In two parts. / By Symon Patrick, D.D. now Lord Bishop of Ely.
titleStmt.author: Patrick, Simon, 1626-1707.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Luke Meredith, at the Star, and sold by R. Wilkin, at the King's Head in St. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: With a preliminary imprimatur leaf and 3 final errata and contents leaves.
Imperfect: tightly bound with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.

place.placeName: the King's Head in St. Paul's Church-yard
